channel.title: Di-Volution with Herman Singh
channel.managingEditor: di-volution@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Herman Singh | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
A world in transition from analogue to digital, while in a war with a pandemic.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard

item.itunes:title: 20 | Wirk, wirk, wirk, wirk, wirk | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: The future of work, the organisation and the employee
item.description:
Chapter 20 Wirk, wirk, wirk, wirk, wirk The future of work, the organisation and the employee The organisation of work is a central pillar of all enterprises. We are now moving from a control to collaboration and from planning to creativity.


Future Advisory website https://future-advisory.co.za

More articles by Herman Singh https://future-advisory.co.za/thought-leadership/

About the book Di-Volution https://di-volution.com


Connect with Herman on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/herman-singh-b669357/

Join the conversation on Twitter https://twitter.com/futureherman

item.description:
Chapter 19 Re-architecting the business Future-proofing the business Di-Volution involves re-architecting your business in a very logical and scientific manner. This flies in the face of random experimentation and investments in most firms.

item.itunes:subtitle: Leadership's role in digital transformation
item.description:
Chapter 17 Digital Transformation – Kings and Presidents Leadership's role in digital transformation Stakeholder management is one of the most critical tasks in digital transformation. Keeping the board and executive committee sold is a key task on this very difficult journey.

item.title: 16 | Who moved my iceberg? Survival tips for the incumbents | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:title: 16 | Who moved my iceberg? Survival tips for the incumbents | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Survival tips for the incumbents
item.description:
Chapter 16 Who moved my iceberg? Survival tips for the incumbents Incumbents fail in the war of Di-Volution because they squander resources on defending the legacy. Transformation will require a 2 speed process and ambidextrous leadership.

item.description:

item.title: 12 | Corporate foundations are sinking into the digital swamp | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:title: 12 | Corporate foundations are sinking into the digital swamp | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Assets turn into liabilities in the digital swamp
item.description:
Chapter 12 Corporate foundations are sinking into the digital swamp Assets turn into liabilities in the digital swamp Assets turn into liabilities rapidly in a digital war or pandemic. Digital attackers are asset light and attack in packs like many predators leaving asset heavy incumbents very vulnerable.


Future Advisory website https://future-advisory.co.za

More articles by Herman Singh https://future-advisory.co.za/thoughtleadership

About the book Di-Volution https://di-volution.com

item.description:

item.itunes:title: 07 | The start up – the insurgent drivers of disruption | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: The drivers of disruption
item.description:

item.itunes:author: Herman Singh | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: 06 | Where forth cometh the change? I’ll see you at the edge | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:title: 06 | Where forth cometh the change? I’ll see you at the edge | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Understanding the source of the change
item.description:
Chapter 6 Where forth cometh the change? I’ll see you at the edge Understanding the source of the change Disruption is about change and it is uncomfortable. It leads to a new normal so it is resisted. Therefore change always starts at the edge and permeates to the center.


Future Advisory website https://future-advisory.co.za

Articles by Herman Singh https://future-advisory.co.za/thought-leadership

About the book Di-Volution https://di-volution.com

item.content:encoded:
Chapter 6 Where forth cometh the change? I’ll see you at the edge Understanding the source of the change Disruption is about change and it is uncomfortable. It leads to a new normal so it is resisted. Therefore change always starts at the edge and permeates to the center.

item.itunes:author: Herman Singh | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: 02 | What is this digital you speak of? | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:title: 02 | What is this digital you speak of? | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Want to sell your strategy? Add the word 'digital'
item.description:
Chapter 2 What is this digital you speak of? Want to sell your strategy? Add the word 'digital' In this episode Herman Singh explains the meaning of digital, digitisation and digitalisation; the evolution of the digital economy from the starting blocks of vacuum tubes and transistors. How technology has infiltrated every aspect of our lives over the last 7 decades.


Future Advisory website www.future-advisory.co.za

More articles by Herman Singh www.future-advisory.co.za/thought-leadership


Connect with Herman on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/herman-singh-b669357/

item.itunes:title: 01 | The Evolution of Di-Volution. How the heck did we get here? | Herman Singh (Future Advisory | CEO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Making sense of the future
item.description:
Chapter 1 The Evolution of Di-Volution. How the heck did we get here? Herman Singh explains the foundation on which Di-Volution is based. Understanding what happened to bring us to this stage of coping with a pandemic in a world of digital transformation.

item.itunes:title: Prologue | A world in transition
item.itunes:subtitle: We're in a war - with a pandemic
item.description:
Di-Volution is about a world in transition from analogue to digital. Listen to Herman Singh's prologue, and then join us on this journey.
